entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
